Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.
